channel.title: Qt on RenderForge
channel.description: Recent content in Qt on RenderForge

item.title: Barzin Inventory Management System
item.description: Barzin is a software that I developed in C++ using the Qt library. I aimed to create a modern general inventory management system. For this reason, in parallel with the core capabilities, say adding products with different attributes or registering customers’ orders, I tried to add some features to this software to make it distinctive from its common counterparts; feature like “Dark Mode” is one of my favorites among these features that I rarely see in common software in this area.
